content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Slovak version of the training is available here:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"attachment\",\"data\":{\"size\":64004,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/44584b1a-dc06-4712-95b0-cb5a1e58bb67/Slovakia - Slovak - EPAM Employee Privacy Notice 2023.docx\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/44584b1a-dc06-4712-95b0-cb5a1e58bb67/Slovakia - Slovak - EPAM Employee Privacy Notice 2023.docx\",\"fileName\":\"Slovakia - Slovak - EPAM Employee Privacy Notice 2023.docx\",\"name\":\"Slovakia - Slovak - EPAM Employee Privacy Notice 2023.docx\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"application\",\"subtype\":\"vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"attachment\",\"id\":\"44584b1a-dc06-4712-95b0-cb5a1e58bb67\",\"extension\":\"docx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"English version:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Systems s.r.o.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", with registered seat at: Hodžovo námestie 1A, Bratislava 811 06, Slovak Republic (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\"EPAM\\\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\") recognizes our employees' right to privacy.  We are providing you with this Privacy Notice to explain our practices regarding the collection, use, and other processing of certain individually identifiable information about you (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\"personal data\\\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\") pursuant to the General Data Protection Regulation (“GDPR”) and Act No. 18/2018 Coll. on the protection of personal data and on the amendment of certain laws.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
